content: ❗️ free tutorial for size s + the best price & more always on my website https //loopsonly com/products/sundance-dress designed with a breezy fit dramatic ruffles and built-in pockets this dress is the perfect mix of comfort and statement-making fashion featuring alternating treble and single_crochet stitches this design creates an airy lightweight texture that drapes beautifully **materials** …yarn a drops loves you 7 8/4 classic cotton yarn group a sport weight color 01 white 100g / 340m 100g / 340m 150g / 510m 150g / 510m 200g / 680m 200g / 680m b drops loves you 7 8/4 classic cotton yarn group a sport weight color 57 lemonade 600g / 2040m 600g / 2040m 700g / 2380m 700g / 2380m 700g / 2380m 850g / 2890m c drops loves you 7 8/4 classic cotton yarn group a sport weight color 33 goldenrod 150g / 510m 150g / 510m 200g / 680m 250g / 850m 300g / 1020m 300g / 1020m …other hook 4 mm hook yarn needle scissors measuring tape stitch markers **gauge** 16 sts x 8 row = 10 x 10 cm in alternating 1 tc 1 single_crochet row **finished measurements in centimeters ** xs s m l xl 2xl shoulder to shoulder 36 38 40 43 45 46 bust circumference 141 144 156 163 175 178 length 79 79 86 86 91 91 armhole depth 14 16 19 21 24 26 **specialty stitch & technique key** none **stitch key us terminology ** chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet rs = right side single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch slip_stitch flo = slip_stitch front loop only st = stitch sts = stitches tc = treble_crochet tc flo = treble_crochet front loop only yo = yarn over ws = wrong side **notes** you will begin by crocheting two panels front and back and sewing the shoulders together next create the pockets directly onto the panels and sew the body sides and pockets together then crochet the sleeves directly onto the dress finish with a round of single_crochet around the neckline followed by a slip_stitch in the front loop only even numbered row are the right side chain 2 and chain 3 doesn t count as a stitch watch my youtube video tutorial for any uncertainties
